sourcesContent:
<template>
  <v-card style="height: 200px;" color="#1F8A70">
    <v-card-title class="text-h4 font-weight-black text-white mt-6 ml-4">销售人员增加</v-card-title>
    <v-card-subtitle class="text-h6 font-weight-black text-white mt-4 ml-4">
      在此可以增加销售人员的ID、姓名、电子邮箱、手机号码等信息
    </v-card-subtitle>
    <v-card-text>
<!--      <v-btn-->
<!--          color="#004358"-->
<!--          class="font-weight-black text-white mt-2 ml-4"-->
<!--          plain-->
<!--          @click="batchDeleteSaler"-->
<!--      >-->
<!--        <v-icon>mdi-file-remove</v-icon>-->
<!--        批量删除-->
<!--      </v-btn>-->
    </v-card-text>
  </v-card>
  <v-form
      v-model="valid"
      lazy-validation
  >
    <v-text-field
        v-model="name"
        :counter="10"
        :rules="nameRules"
        label="Name"
        required
    ></v-text-field>
    <v-text-field
        v-model="email"
        :rules="emailRules"
        label="E-mail"
        required
    ></v-text-field>
    <v-text-field
        v-model="password"
        :rules="passwordRules"
        label="Password"
        required
    ></v-text-field>
    <v-text-field
        v-model="phone"
        :rules="phoneRules"
        label="Phone"
        required
    ></v-text-field>
    <v-btn
        :disabled="!valid"
        color="success"
        class="mr-4"
        @click="validate"
    >
      Commit
    </v-btn>
  </v-form>
</template>

<script>

import {onMounted, ref, watch, toRefs, reactive} from "vue";
import {insertSaler} from "../../../../network/saler";

export default {
  name: "adminInsertSaler",
  setup() {

    let form = reactive({
      name: "",
      email: "",
      password: "",
      phone: "",
    })

    let valid = true
    let nameRules = [
      v => !!v || 'Name is required',
      v => (v && v.length <= 10) || 'Name must be less than 10 characters',
    ]
    let emailRules = [
      v => !!v || 'E-mail is required',
      v => /.+@.+\..+/.test(v) || 'E-mail must be valid',
    ]
    let passwordRules = [
      v => !!v || 'E-mail is required',
    ]
    let phoneRules = [
      v => !!v || 'Name is required',
      v => (v && v.length !== 11) || 'Name must be less than 10 characters',
    ]

    const validate = () => {
      insertSaler(form).then(res=>{
        
      })
    }

    return {
      valid,
      nameRules,
      emailRules,
      passwordRules,
      phoneRules,
      ...toRefs(form),
      validate,
    }
  }
}
</script>

<style scoped>

</style>
